metadata.name: Chimera
metadata.description:
Title: Chimera

Medium: Mushroom spores on paper, ASCII & glitch art on mobile phone.

Description: This piece was created using stencil cut outs to direct where mushroom spores would land on the paper. The original was photographed and then destroyed by fire. The photograph was then edited using a mobile phone, using ASCII and glitch apps.

A minted video of the proof of destruction is included in the purchase.

Jacob Matthew Dix
